title: Kawng zau taka hawnin a awm
lyrics:
Kawng zau taka hawnin a awm,
Kawng eng mawi nuam tak mai chu,
Kraws engin chu kawn nuamah chuan,
Lalpa hmangaih a rawn puang.

Aw, Khawngaihna a va thuk em!
Kawng chu ka tan hawn a ni em?
Ka tan, ka tan,
Ka tan hawn a ni em?

Mi zawng zawng tan kawn hawn a ni,
Chhandamna zawngtute tan;
Mi hausa leh retheite pawh,
Hman leh chi tinrengte tan.

Khawngaihna kawng hawn lai a ni,
Hmelmate bei hram hram r'u;
Bang lovin kraw pu zel rawh u,
Lallukhum tiam sa a ni.

Hetah kraws pu mah ilangin,
Lui ralah kan dah tawh ang;
Nunna lallukhum chu khumin,
Amah kan hmangaih zual ang.
